Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Thomas
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Division and Laramie, due to street blockage near Laramie/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Chicago, Central, Division and Laramie, due to street blockage near Laramie/Thomas.

Allow extra travel time.
